name: Archana Solar Technologies
overview: Leveraging on years of industrial experience and profound knowledge of the respective domain, we, Archana Solar Technologies have become a leading manufacturer, trader, supplier and exporter of a qualitative range of Solar Lighting Products, Solar Fans, Solar Home Packs, Solar Energy Products and Solar Photovoltaic Modules. Further, our range encompasses Small Solar Photovoltaic Modules, Large Solar Photovoltaic Modules, Medium Solar Photovoltaic Modules, Solar Stand Fans, Portable Solar Fans, Solar Emergency Lights, Mini Solar Lanterns and many others. All these products are acknowledged among clients for causing less global warming. Our products are also admired for their long service life, sturdy construction, hassle free performance and many more. Moreover, products offered by us are available in different specifications and can also be availed in tailor-made forms. Due to their best quality and reliability, our range is extensively used in electronic and electric industries. Apart from this, we have achieved an ISO 9001:2008 Certification for endlessly providing quality approved range in the market and making reliable and transparent dealings with clients. Owing to the above mentioned factors, we have garnered huge clientele support based in the market of Italy, Netherlands, United Kingdom, Spain, Singapore and Australia.
